title: What Is Machine Learning (ML)?
GPT_response: The article provides an overview of machine learning, explaining its different branches like supervised, unsupervised, semi-supervised learning, and reinforcement learning. It also touches on topics such as neural networks, deep learning, practical applications of machine learning, ethical concerns, and common algorithms used in machine learning. Additionally, it discusses the advantages and disadvantages of machine learning, along with its impact on various sectors like healthcare, finance, and customer service.
